ygData.subject: New to this forum....Infravision goggles
ygData.msgSnippet: I be new to this forum, So I am not sure if it has been discussed or not, Has anyone figured out the other pieces to the infravision goggles yet?  I am just
ygData.messageBody:
I be new to this forum, So I am not sure if it has been discussed or not,
Has anyone figured out the other pieces to the infravision goggles yet? I
am just not sure which pieces to start trying out, I was thinking maybe some
metal twine to connect the lenses. Has this been discussed, anyone brought
any ideas into it? And also for those of you who haven't heard, I've had 2
people mail me on existance of the lenses.. They are called the "Lens of
Glowing Amber" Which makes me pretty much think that they are definately the
first component. And they are dropped by a froglock summoner in upper guk.
Personally I am not high enough to go find these myself yet..So have not
personally seen one but have seen various posts enough to know that they do
exist..except people don't know what to do with them. And I am sure this is
a rare drop because you just don't see those over the auction channels
everyday..;)

Shokakon
Gnome Necromancer of Tunare
